Title: Authorizes the city of New York to provide for a residential parking permit system
Summary: Authorizes the city of New York to provide for a residential parking permit system to reduce hazards and pollution levels.
LawCode: Add ยง1640-r, V & T L; amd ยง1270-i, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing a residential parking permit system in the city of New York; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
